sentences.english: They are like twins both in appearance and in behavior.
sentences.chinese: 外貌还是举止都活似双胞胎。

sentences.english: If one twin pushes, will the other push back?
sentences.chinese: 假如一个双胞胎推挤，另一个会不会推回去？

sentences.english: There are striking resemblances between the twin brothers.
sentences.chinese: 双胞胎的长相有惊人的相似之处。

sentences.english: Grandmother dotes on her the twins.
How was I supposed to know that the one twin would break it with his head?
sentences.chinese: 我怎能料到双胞胎中的一个会用头把他弄碎呢？

sentences.english: Li Dan and Li Fang are twins. They look the same.
sentences.chinese: 李丹和李芳是双胞胎，她们看起来很像。

sentences.english: When she saw her brother she asked him about the twins.
sentences.chinese: 她一见到弟弟，便问他有关双胞胎的事。

sentences.english: Twi have the highest rate of match, followed by siblings .
sentences.chinese: 双胞胎相配的几率最高，接下来是兄弟姐妹。

sentences.english: Barbara Bush, Jenna's twin, is the maid of honor.
sentences.chinese: 詹娜的双胞胎姐姐芭芭拉将担任伴娘。

sentences.english: A king-size conundrum ruins ruined, twins who are both first.
sentences.chinese: 一座特大王室废墟遭到摧毁，都是第一的双胞胎。

sentences.english: The legend is that when Leda was fecundated she gave birth to twins.
sentences.chinese: 传说勒达怀孕后生了一对双胞胎。

sentences.english: Control Center: Autobot twins, report to Hangar Three.
sentences.chinese: 汽车人双胞胎到三号机库报到。

sentences.english: If you're carrying twins or triplets, you might need to gain more weight.
sentences.chinese: 如果你打算怀双胞胎或者三胞胎你要增加更多的重量。

sentences.english: Identicals share one of the closest human relationships biologically.
sentences.chinese: 在生理上，双胞胎享有最为接近的人类关系。

sentences.english: The twins are of equal height.
sentences.chinese: 这对双胞胎个头儿一样高。

definition: Nana (name)/Nana (1880 novel by Émile Zola)/Nana (Japanese manga series)
(of siblings) having the same mother but different fathers/half (brother or sister)
mother and child/parent and subsidiary (companies)/principal and interest
